verbose_text: While analyzing the body content before diet correction it was ascertained that in 77% of women under research, the amount of fat in the body, important not only to assess the risk of such metabolic disorders as insulin resistance or dyslipidemia [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] but also diseases such as vessels atherosclerosis, arterial hypertension and other [XREF_BIBR], was much higher than recommended standards for this age group (22-31%).
